name: prey-plugin-campfire
description: Lets you control Prey through a Campfire chat session.

token.message: The Prey user's Campfire user/API token. You need to use a separate user for this, not your own.

room_id.message: The Room ID to connect to. It's the last part of the URL when the chat window is open.

nickname.message: The nickname under which Prey will appear on the chat room.

magic_word.message: The magic word you'll use on the chat room to identify yourself.
